21-0_training_51_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name, MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up FROM random_company_name_4 AS cn,
   random_company_type_4 AS ct,
   random_keyword_4 AS k,
   random_movie_companies_4 AS mc,
   random_movie_info_4 AS mi,
   random_movie_keyword_4 AS mk,
   random_title_4 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[mx]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%l%' OR cn.name LIKE '%g%')
AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
AND k.keyword = 'gas'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('English', 'USA:15 January 1959', 'Poland:4 April 2013', 'En sÃ¤gen i bilder', 'USA:18 June 1962')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1943 AND 2005;

   random_keyword_4 AS k,

   random_movie_keyword_4 AS mk,

WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[mx]'

AND k.keyword = 'pain'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('PCS:Spherical', 'England soon?', 'UK:2 May 1967', '- 2011', 'Chile:6 July 2003')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1953 AND 2004;
